dictionary.lore:
A lightsteel belt sporting a horseshoe buckle belonging to Kahiki, one of the twelve creature candidates sent to the earthly realm to compete for the prized position of Emperor Yu's assistant.

Horse was the perfect mix of carefree spirit and energy, his mane trailing behind him as he chased the winds across the plains. Initially trapped by the vast expanse of blue surrounding the island he arrived on, a first encounter with a rolling wave soon replaced that trepidation with transcendence.

name: Horse's Calm
